summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Physicians Formula Highlighter & Contour Powder Palette, Shimmer Strobing, Fragrance Free, Paraben Free, Gluten Free, Dermatologist Tested
Review Date: 2019/04/20
Store: Physicians Formula
Product Description: ["Cult-worthy, must-have palette features universally-flattering shades in a blendable and buildable shimmer finish. Triple-Action Bronze Booster: our exclusive blend helps to enhance and extend the life of your tan glow and improve skin's clarity and radiance."]
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmer glow', 'Coverage': 'Full', 'Brand': 'Physicians Formula', 'Color': 'Shimmer Strobing', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.06 x 1.9 x 5.38 inches; 2.24 Ounces', 'Item model number': '6809', 'UPC': '044386068094', 'Manufacturer': 'Physicians Formula'}
Review Text: I liked the cool tone in the middle, so I decided to give this a try. I'm glad I did and the middle is a nice contour shade for me, but I'm not loving the other two shades. I prefer the physicians formula butter bronzer for warmth and will absolutely continue to use that one over the warmer bronze shade in this palette.
Review Title: Meh...it's okay the PF Butter Bronzer is my FAV!
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: EmaxDesign Makeup Brushes 17 Pieces Premium Synthetic Foundation Brush Powder Blending Blush Concealer Eye Face Liquid Powder Cream Cosmetics Brushes Kit (Rose Gold)
Review Date: 2019/04/20
Store: EmaxDesign
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'EmaxDesign', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Eyebrow Brush, For Eyeshadow, For Concealing, Lip Brush, For Setting Powder, For Eyelining, For Foundation, Blending BrushEyebrow Brush, For Eyeshadow, For Concealing, Lip Brush, For Setting Powder, For Eyelining, For Foundation, Blending Brush  See more', 'Color': 'rose gold', 'Material': 'Wood', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '17', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Handle Material': 'Wood', 'Ferrule Material': 'Copper', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.49 x 5.91 x 1.46 inches; 7.05 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MB1701', 'UPC': '603149356153', 'Manufacturer': 'EmaxDesign'}
Review Text: I purchased these as part of a makeup haul gift set for my sister in law and she really loves them. I only gave them 4 stars, because I'm just not sure how long they will last. I'll update this review after a year.
Review Title: Makes a nice gift!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Stellaire Chern Makeup brush set, 10 Pcs Premium Synthetic Cosmetic Brushes, Foundation Blending Blush Powder Eye Shadow Make Up Brushes Kit - Purple
Review Date: 2019/05/10
Store: STELLAIRE CHERN
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'STELLAIRE CHERN', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'For Eyeshadow, For Foundation', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '10', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Copper', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '2 x 2 x 2 inches', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 2 inches; 7.2 Ounces'}
Review Text: Really nice, better than expected for the price. I purchased these as a gift.....thinking I should get myself a set as part of my travel bag. These were delivered on time and nicely packaged.
Review Title: Nice, soft and love the purple!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: ANNNOAH Profesional Goat Hair Ita Kabuki Makeup No. 21 Contour Brush
Review Date: 2019/12/13
Store: ANNNOAH
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'ANNNOAH', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Contour', 'Material': 'Animal Hair', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.2 x 0.9 x 1.5 inches', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.2 x 0.9 x 1.5 inches; 0.49 Ounces'}
Review Text: Very soft and did what I wanted it to do, but the longevity isnt there. Maybe because it's so soft but after using it and cleaning it over the last 7ish months it has lost it's shape and doesn't perform as expected.
Review Title: Good for a while
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step:

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

    Remember to:
    - Focus only on keywords and  trends supported by multiple interactions
    - Avoid repeating specific product names or details
    - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The analysis of the purchase history reveals a strong inclination towards cosmetics, particularly focusing on makeup application tools and highlighting products. Consistent ratings suggest a preference for products that blend well and offer buildable coverage, with an average rating of around 4.3. Sentiment is mixed, particularly regarding product longevity and shade suitability, as the buyer often expresses dissatisfaction with certain shades or performance durability.

Common themes in product use cases indicate a focus on enhancing skin tone and applying makeup effectively, with a notable preference for multifunctional tools. Quality preferences lean towards synthetic and soft materials that provide a pleasant experience; however, concerns regarding durability and performance longevity frequently arise.

Price sensitivity appears moderate; the buyer values quality but also seeks gifts at reasonable price points, suggesting a balance between performance and value. 

In essence, core preferences emphasize a desire for versatile, quality makeup tools and products that complement skin tones, alongside a preference for soft finishes and reasonable longevity, reflecting both enjoyment in cosmetics and practical concerns about product lifespan.

target_interaction.title: Love it even though the fit seems off!
target_interaction.text: Love the convenience of this pump. The major flaw is that is doesn't actually securely fit on all 1.5 or 1 liter listerine bottles. But it does rest on it well enough to pump out product and not cause a mess. Really glad I picked it up, makes my mornings and evenings easier even with the fit issue.
target_interaction.title_meta: Listerine Pump for 1.5 or 1 Liter Bottles (1 Pump)
description: Pump for 1 L and 1.5 L Bottles
